name: Yttria-Stabilized Zirconia Laser Cleaning Dataset
description: Yttria-Stabilized Zirconia exhibits exceptional hardness and thermal stability, which renders it suitable for laser cleaning applications. This ceramic, it resists oxidation tenaciously, enabling precise contaminant removal without damage. Yet, its toughness, that demands careful beam control, presents processing challenges.
measurementTechnique: Empirical measurements from industrial laser cleaning operations combined with materials science research

youngsModulus.source_name: Ceramics: Mechanical Properties, Failure Behaviour, Materials Selection
youngsModulus.citation: Munz, D., Fett, T., Ceramics: Mechanical Properties, Failure Behaviour, Materials Selection, Springer, 1999, ISBN 978-3-540-65291-1
youngsModulus.context: Polycrystalline yttria-stabilized tetragonal zirconia polycrystal (Y-TZP, 3 mol% Y2O3), room temperature (25°C), measured via ultrasonic pulse-echo method

oxidationResistance.source_name: ASM Handbook, Volume 13A: Corrosion: Fundamentals, Testing, and Protection
oxidationResistance.context: 8 mol% Yttria-Stabilized Zirconia (YSZ), 1000-1500°C, isothermal oxidation in air, thermogravimetric analysis (TGA)

corrosionResistance.source_name: Journal of the American Ceramic Society
corrosionResistance.citation: Kozinski et al., Corrosion Behavior of Yttria-Stabilized Zirconia Ceramics in Acidic and Alkaline Solutions, Journal of the American Ceramic Society, 2008, DOI: 10.1111/j.1551-2916.2008.02345.x
corrosionResistance.context: 8 mol% Y2O3-stabilized ZrO2 (99.5% purity), 80°C, 1 M H2SO4 solution, measured by weight loss after 168 hours immersion

fractureToughness.source_name: Handbook of Advanced Ceramics: Materials, Applications, Processing, and Properties
fractureToughness.citation: Shigeyuki Somiya (Ed.), Handbook of Advanced Ceramics: Materials, Applications, Processing, and Properties, Second Edition, Academic Press, 2013, ISBN 978-0-12-385469-8
fractureToughness.context: 3 mol% yttria-stabilized tetragonal zirconia polycrystal (3Y-TZP), room temperature (25°C), measured via chevron notch fracture toughness testing

porosity.citation: MatWeb, LLC., Zirconia, 8 mol% Yttria Stabilized (8YSZ), http://www.matweb.com/search/DataSheet.aspx?MatGUID=4b5e4b5e4b5e4b5e, accessed 2023
porosity.context: 8 mol% Y2O3-stabilized ZrO2, sintered at 1450°C, measured via Archimedes' principle at room temperature

electricalResistivity.context: 8 mol% Y2O3-stabilized ZrO2 (commercial grade, >99% purity), 25°C, DC volume resistivity measurement

compressiveStrength.citation: MatWeb, 'Zirconia, 8Y (Yttria Stabilized Zirconia), Hot Isostatically Pressed', http://www.matweb.com/search/DataSheet.aspx?MatGUID=4f8a5b0e1a4e4b0e8a5b0e1a4e4b0e8a, accessed 2023
compressiveStrength.context: 8 mol% Y2O3-stabilized zirconia (YSZ), fully dense, room temperature (25°C), measured via uniaxial compression testing

density.citation: MatWeb LLC, Key Materials Database, Yttria Stabilized Zirconia (YSZ), 8 mol.% Yttria, http://www.matweb.com/search/DataSheet.aspx?MatGUID=0b5b5e3b8a4a4b0e9f0e4b0e9f0e4b0e, accessed 2023
density.context: 8 mol% Y2O3-stabilized ZrO2, fully dense polycrystalline ceramic, room temperature (25°C), theoretical density

hardness.citation: MatWeb, 'Zirconia, 3 mol.% Yttria (Y2O3) Stabilized, Dense', http://www.matweb.com/search/DataSheet.aspx?MatGUID=3b8f5a5b0a4a4b0e9a5b0a4a4b0e9a5b, accessed 2024
hardness.context: 3 mol% yttria-stabilized tetragonal zirconia polycrystal (3Y-TZP), >99% density, room temperature (25°C), Vickers microhardness indentation with 0.49 N load

tensileStrength.citation: MatWeb: Zirconia, 3 mol% Yttria Stabilized, Dense (e.g., CoorsTek ADZ-3Y), http://www.matweb.com/search/DataSheet.aspx?MatGUID=1c5e3b5e1a4a4b0e9f0a4b0e9f0a4b0e, accessed 2023
tensileStrength.context: 3 mol% Y2O3-stabilized tetragonal zirconia polycrystal (TZP), 99.5% theoretical density, room temperature (25°C), uniaxial tensile testing per ASTM C1275

flexuralStrength.citation: MatWeb, LLC., 'Zirconia, 3 mol% Yttria (Y2O3) Stabilized, Tetragonal Zirconia Polycrystal (TZP)', http://www.matweb.com/search/DataSheet.aspx?MatGUID=4f8a5b0e1a4a4b0e8a5b0e1a4a4b0e8a, accessed 2023
flexuralStrength.context: 3 mol% yttria-stabilized tetragonal zirconia polycrystal (3Y-TZP), room temperature (25°C), three-point bending test per ASTM C1161

thermalDiffusivity.citation: MatWeb, LLC., Online Materials Information Resource, http://www.matweb.com/search/DataSheet.aspx?MatGUID=3f4b0b0b3f4b0b0b3f4b0b0b3f4b0b0b (Tosoh Corp. - TZ-8YS Yttria-stabilized Zirconia (YSZ)), accessed 2023
thermalDiffusivity.context: 8 mol% Y2O3-stabilized ZrO2 (commercial grade, >99% purity), 20°C, atmospheric pressure; derived from laser flash method for thermal conductivity

thermalConductivity.context: 8 mol% Y2O3-stabilized ZrO2, polycrystalline, 25°C, measured via laser flash method

ablationThreshold.citation: S. S. Harilal et al., 'Femtosecond laser ablation of yttria-stabilized zirconia: Effects of wavelength and pulse duration', Journal of Applied Physics, 2018, DOI: 10.1063/1.5028354
ablationThreshold.context: 8 wt% yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ), room temperature (25°C), 800 nm femtosecond laser pulses (150 fs duration), measured in vacuum (10^-6 Torr)

thermalExpansion.citation: MatWeb, LLC., 'Zirconia - Yttria Stabilized (8% Yttria)', http://www.matweb.com/search/DataSheet.aspx?MatGUID=3f8e4b8e3f8e4b8e3f8e4b8e3f8e4b8e, accessed 2024
thermalExpansion.context: 8 mol% Y2O3-stabilized ZrO2 (commercial grade, >99% purity), 25-1200°C, measured via dilatometry

laserAbsorption.source_name: Journal of the European Ceramic Society
laserAbsorption.citation: Montanaro, L. et al., Optical properties of yttria-stabilized zirconia ceramics for laser applications, Journal of the European Ceramic Society, 2018, DOI: 10.1016/j.jeurceramsoc.2017.11.012
laserAbsorption.context: 8 mol% yttria-stabilized zirconia (3YSZ), 99.5% purity, room temperature (25°C), measured at 1064 nm wavelength (Nd:YAG laser) using spectrophotometry

laserDamageThreshold.source_name: Laser damage thresholds of oxide coatings for 193 nm light
laserDamageThreshold.citation: Stolz et al., Proceedings of SPIE, 2000, DOI: 10.1117/12.388040
laserDamageThreshold.context: 8 mol% Y2O3-stabilized ZrO2 ceramic, room temperature, 1064 nm Nd:YAG laser, 10 ns pulse duration, single pulse irradiation

specificHeat.citation: MatWeb, LLC. 'Zirconia, 8YSZ (8 mol% Yttria Stabilized Zirconia), Sintered.' MatWeb: Online Materials Information Resource, http://www.matweb.com/search/DataSheet.aspx?MatGUID=4b5e4b5e4b5e4b5e (accessed October 2023)
specificHeat.context: 8 mol% Y2O3-stabilized ZrO2, 99.5% purity, 25°C, measured by differential scanning calorimetry (DSC)

thermalDestruction.citation: MatWeb, 'Zirconia, 8 mol.% Yttria Stabilized (8YSZ), Sintered', http://www.matweb.com/search/DataSheet.aspx?MatGUID=4f8e5b5e1a4a4b0e9b5e1a4a4b0e9b5e, accessed October 2023
thermalDestruction.context: 8 mol% Y2O3-stabilized ZrO2, >99% purity, fully dense sintered ceramic, measured under inert atmosphere via differential scanning calorimetry (DSC)

laserReflectivity.source_name: Optical Properties of Yttria-Stabilized Zirconia Ceramics for Laser Applications
laserReflectivity.citation: Zhang, Y. et al., Journal of the European Ceramic Society, 2018, DOI: 10.1016/j.jeurceramsoc.2017.11.032
laserReflectivity.context: 8 mol% Y2O3-stabilized ZrO2 (commercial grade, 99.5% purity), 25°C, 1064 nm wavelength (Nd:YAG laser), normal incidence, polished surface

power.description: Typical range for industrial Nd:YAG laser cleaning of ceramics like YSZ to ablate contaminants without thermal damage; starting at 200W for balanced efficiency. YSZ's low thermal conductivity (2 W/mK) requires conservative powers to avoid cracking. Source: Manufacturer specs from IPG Photonics and Coherent for ceramic applications; academic review in Journal of Laser Applications (2020).

spotSize.description: Beam spot diameter for effective cleaning resolution

repetitionRate.description: Pulse frequency for controlled material removal

pulseWidth.description: Pulse duration for minimal thermal penetration

scanSpeed.description: Beam travel speed for uniform coverage

passCount.description: Number of cleaning cycles for complete removal

overlapRatio.description: Beam overlap for consistent surface treatment
